snippet: The United States soccer team will play Antigua and Barbuda on Friday in a crucial World Cup qualifier, but many of the team’s top players will not be available.
lead_paragraph: The United States soccer team will play Antigua and Barbuda on Friday in a crucial World Cup qualifier, but many of the team’s top players will not be available.

headline.seo: U.S. Soccer Stretched Thin for Qualifier vs. Antigua
headline.main: For Pivotal Qualifier vs. Antigua, U.S. Is Stretched Thin
headline.print_headline: For Pivotal Qualifier vs. Antigua, U.S. Is Stretched Thin
